website_summaries.verdict: The Sennheiser HD 569 headphones are exceptionally comfortable and deliver a rewardingly rich and clear audio experience.
pros: Crisp, clear sound signature with accurate bass depth
Ships with two detachable cables, one with inline remote and mic, one with 0.25-inch headphone connection
Comfortable fit over long listening sessions

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: These are supposed to be the replacement model for the px-100ii, however the specs are not as good and On a direct comparison, they sound NO WAY NEAR as good as the px-100ii, sound is about half as good and if they still made the px-100ii I would pay 3 times the price of these headphones without hesitation However saying that, the 2.20s are okay for a cheap pair of headphones. They are a little tight on the head but if you can tolerate the plastic headband and be careful, they will be perfectly ok for normal use, just don’t expect any miracles. They are far better than the similarly priced competition and for £20 you can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good pair off headphones without forking out £200+
customer_reviews.text: Good sound especially the bass. Treble can be a bit sharp and snappy but not badly. Comfortable enough to wear for about a couple hours as it's quite light and the cushions are very soft and springy but won't fit very well if you have big ears as the hole between the cushion is sort of oval shaped and not too big. Overall, they're a pretty good set of headphones for music or general use if you're not willing to fork out for a £200+ pair for extra quality
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic but with a fragile feel
customer_reviews.text: This are FANTASTIC headphones!!! Sonicaly unbeatable under £60 - Sennheiser did it again :) Downside: 1. Detachable cables would be great even for a slightly higher price. 2. Durability will be questionable as they are extremely comfy but feel a bit fragile so do not buy them if you are going to squeeze them somewhere in a laptop bag!
customer_reviews.author: Underground Rat

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: Very unimpressed... no bass... midrange average. Trebble OK. Large size compared to the model it replaced and lower spec. They feel cheep but they are not. If you had the previous moddel do NOT buy these as you will be unhappy at the change. I was a firm fan of this company but I will think twince in the future. I am already looking for a replacement...!
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Stunning sound quality.  Handsfree  works pretty well too!
customer_reviews.text: Bought purely because I recognised the brand, and they were on offer. Sound quality is excellent, they don't hurt my ears when wearing them, and the handsfree quality is pretty good. The only downside is that the cable could do with another 20-30cm on it I reckon. It's probably long enough for most people though. I'm hoping they last for a long time - they don't seem to be serviceable in any way, so they'll end up in landfill eventually sadly.
customer_reviews.author: English Guy

customer_reviews.title: Excellant
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are extremely soft and comfortable to wear. The sound is also very good - whether you are watching a film or listening to music. Great value for money. Would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha H.

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my husband for his birthday and he is beyond thrilled with them. The clarity of sound and comfort from the padded ear pieces makes them easy to wear all day (he's a computer programmer). These are the newer version of the Sennheiser headphones he got me for Christmas and these are better, which is hard to believe. Excellent buy
customer_reviews.author: bumblebee

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality's fine, but the plastic around the hinges started cracking ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality's fine, but the plastic around the hinges started cracking after not long & the ridiculous right angle jack design gets caught on things all the time and yanked out
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: great for films and music
customer_reviews.text: Really comfy and have a great range of sound. I have always like Sennheiser headphones and these don't disappoint. I also use these for film nights while the little one is asleep upstairs and I get really engrossed in the action.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Sound OK but make my ears hurt.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality of these headphones is acceptable given the price, however I'm only giving them 3 stars overall because they are very uncomfortable over long periods, they are advertised as around ear but I'm not sure who's ears they are talking about. I don't have big ears but my ears don't fully fit and the resulting pressure on the upper part of my ears can become quite uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: TR Quartermain

customer_reviews.title: The headphones are excellent and are not readily heard by others unless volume ...
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are excellent and are not readily heard by others unless volume is turned up high. I'm not a sound expert but for what I need these do the job. Definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: N. BEAN

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Having purchased Sony headphones for many years I decided to go with a better brand. Although more expensive, you get what you pay for and these are very good. Very comfy and easy to adjust (photo 2 fully adjusted, photo 3 minimum adjustment) and the sound quality is very good. Would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer19

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, uncomfortable on ears
customer_reviews.text: I found this uncomfortable on the ear, regardless of the cushioning on them. The thin headband with no cushioning also became uncomfortable so I ended up sending these back. Sound was great though.
customer_reviews.author: L.Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd read reviews before getting these.
customer_reviews.text: Wasted my money. The image shows a detachable cable, which is for the other model, not this one. The sound quality is atrocious compared to my older Sennheiser headphones. They are uncomfortable, too big, and IMO poor quality. Does anyone still make quality small headphones?
customer_reviews.author: Technical Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and slim .... quite discreet on long dark hair!
customer_reviews.text: Slim pads & comfy - my chin-length dark hair blends well with ear pads that its quite discreet. Great sound, however when i listened to my music on 65% volume on bus, it can be heard by others and respectfully, I turned it down. If you like your music a little louder, it's nice to wear when out walking or at home.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this purchase. They are very comfortable and sit well on my ears. They are light and just the right pressure. Clear high quality sound. Would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: SusanG

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, appaling build quality!
customer_reviews.text: As another reviewed noted (and pictured) build quality is appalling! They cracked around the join between the headband and the extending piece. Perhaps this is a production flaw with some units, where the plastic is damaged and prone to stress fractures. Whatever the case might be, they were unusable after a couple of months of occasional use, a total waste of money and not at all fit for purpose. I suspect this is why Amazon heavily discount them now.
customer_reviews.author: DPG

customer_reviews.title: Decent headphones
customer_reviews.text: Overall, these headphones are quite good for the price I bought them for. I would wait until they are on sale. The padding on the headphone does push my ears against the side of my head slightly, rather than being fully around ear as described. Still decent quality from Sennheiser as usual. The headband at the top is not padded which is odd and slightly uncomfortable, but can be fixed by allowing it to free float above your head instead.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Lyttle

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These headphones feel rather flimsy and the sound from them is distinctly average, lacking in bass.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable on my head
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable on my head, good bass and mid-range though the top end is a little muted. One thing I have to point out is they don't seem very efficient and I have to turn the volume up higher to get a satisfactory level, compared to my old AKG phones anyway (left channel stopped working on those). I paid under £40 so I would say they are very good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: FLUKE

customer_reviews.title: Good quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: Good quality headphones. Neutral sound which I prefer, rather than bass heavy. Perfect for commuting but they lack a large soundstage so not ideal for static use if you are at home etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One happy son
customer_reviews.text: These were bought for my son who says they're very good. He can wear them on the bus and they cancel out other noise. Says sound good and will let me know about durability.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Brownbridge

customer_reviews.title: Weird sound in the left side after 2 months of use
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months of use their started to make a weird sound in the left ear that is just probally my bad luck so don't take this seriously their very good headphones but i am going to have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: RealSenpai

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound, still not as good as the old ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound, still not as good as the old PX100s, but almost there. They are quite tight and push against your ears, so not particularly suitable for extended use. The adjustment is weird too: the bands don't move, but the earpieces move up and down instead.
customer_reviews.author: Mr McD

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and excellent clarity.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable headset and ideal for travellers. Great sound and clarity with both high and low notes clear.
customer_reviews.author: Chinatrader

customer_reviews.title: I can't imagine more expensive head sets being demonstrably better.
customer_reviews.text: I use this set with a lap top computer, and consider the sound quality exceptional, even for the price. The foam ear covers press firmly over the ears, providing a immersive auditory experience. I can't imagine more expensive head sets being demonstrably better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Headline Haedphones
customer_reviews.text: Lovely sound, and compact headphone, just perfect for use with my mp3 and laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Strumblehead

customer_reviews.title: Dreadfull
customer_reviews.text: Most uncomfortable headphones I have ever worn. Actually made your ears hurt after a while. Sennheiser used to make 1st class headphones years ago. Not now.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P Hume

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are extremely comfortable around your head - with great sound quality and good noise cancellation. The cable length is more than enough if you're wearing a device on your person. The folding of the headphones is useful when storing on a backpack. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Wudhead

customer_reviews.title: Very poor sound, unconfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Sennheisser headphones and bought this pair to replace my PX100s when they finally quit on me. Very disappointed. The sound quality is tinny and vague, they are uncomfortable wear as they press hard into your ears, and when folded they are almost the same size. I would advise against buying these. I am gutted I wasted £45.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality for a fair price 😊
customer_reviews.text: I've got a better model however was pleasantly surprised when I managed to get my son to let me try them for a while. He loves that he can use them when gaming 😎
customer_reviews.author: Paul M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect affordable headphone on the run
customer_reviews.text: I travel with them all the time. They are easily foldable and very light to carry around. I also make phone calls with them. The sound is decent and they fit well on the head.But they break easily, Not the headphone part but the connecting end part....Shame
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lapin

customer_reviews.title: Sound good and quite comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: Even that it's a sennheiser headphone I was quite impressed and happy by the sound quality and comfort. It become quickly my daily driver when I listening my music
customer_reviews.author: Minicou

customer_reviews.title: I like the sound so much I bought another pair for ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for someone, I like the sound so much I bought another pair for myself.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Expected more
customer_reviews.text: The product was a failure and it disappointed hugely. Not only was the sound quality bad, it was hard to maintain listening with the headphones as it began to hurt the ear.
customer_reviews.author: Marazaroth

customer_reviews.title: Headphone jack snapped after 7 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 7 months ago, fairy nice sound quality, but very weak around the headphone jack, the protection on the wire near the jack frayed away quickly, then last month the headphone jack snapped off. The remainder had to be professionally removed, but permanently damaged the sound output on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The closest to perfection you can get at this price.
customer_reviews.text: I wear headphones anywhere between 2 and 10 hours a day and this is the only pair I own that don't hurt my ears after the first couple. They are also the best pair I own in terms of sound quality and sounds cancellation. I currently use them with my phone, laptop and PlayStation.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: Really glad I shelled out and bought these. I really like having a mic, and that they're foldable, and the sound is great. If I play it too loud I'm pretty sure people around me hear it but I don't mind too much.
customer_reviews.author: cookiesforlife

customer_reviews.title: Not enough bass
customer_reviews.text: Compared to my HD 202s these are definitely lacking in bass. A bit tight on the ears also - okay if you’re using them for 1 or 2 hours, otherwise they might be a potential physiotherapy for ears that stick out!
customer_reviews.author: Eye in the sky

customer_reviews.title: Comfort for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Love these, I have a small head and other ear phones just fall off, these don't, they extend well for larger heads. Very comfortable if wearing for long periods. Sound quality is good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Very satisfied customer.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value headphones
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable headphones and the sound quality is excellent. Build quality is very good and it is good they fold up for easy storage, I highly recommend the this product
customer_reviews.author: B J D Maple

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but a bit pricey
customer_reviews.text: Very good, perhaps a bit pricey with only a one point four metre cable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Hames

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones - recommended
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product, very comfortable, even for a couple of hours at a time (and I have a big head), brilliant sound.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Baines

customer_reviews.title: They are the best headphones for under 40 pound
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable Produces a good sound and actually have a good amount of bass
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend anyone to buy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for my iPod. I can hear sounds on records I never noticed before. Very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs J

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, poor build
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Sound is ok. Unfortunately the headband cushioning started to come unglued after a year so not great build quality
customer_reviews.author: K. Boulton

customer_reviews.title: Very confortable and great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I may not be the audiophil but the headphones are pretty confortable, nice build quality, great sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: night_walker

customer_reviews.title: Design Fault?
customer_reviews.text: Brought these for my daughter at Christmas, broken already. The Jack plug has broken off with half left in the headphone socket of her phone. Jack plug snapped clean in half. Not a cheap set of headphones, would have expected better build quality. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Steve T

customer_reviews.title: Sennheiser = Great sound & quality
customer_reviews.text: Sennheiser good sound good up small. Cheap on price not quality
customer_reviews.author: Rid

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I have had this headphone for 4 weeks and it's messing about at the wire points to the sockets which leads me belive it's fake beware
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones at an unbelievable price - launch offer price! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Saab311

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I wanted, comfortable to wear and light
customer_reviews.author: Strutty

customer_reviews.title: Worth spending more
customer_reviews.text: Same again. Akg released some amazing headphones for the same price. But again, limited edition. Leather/plastic more like, covers. Sweat you up less your name is Andrew.
customer_reviews.author: Truth

customer_reviews.title: Good points - Sound quality is good
customer_reviews.text: Good points - Sound quality is good. Noise cancelling very good. Bad points - the headband is inflexible and the wire is too short to reach p.c.- bought an extender.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable after a while
customer_reviews.text: Good but hurt your ears after a while. not comfotable
customer_reviews.author: chrissie curtis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good, my son loves it. It blocks out noise from outside and is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Marwan Killu

customer_reviews.title: flat earcups but this is still a good earphone.
customer_reviews.text: I preferred the older models with round, flat earcups but this is still a good earphone.
customer_reviews.author: Orion

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat Sennheiser for value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for a such a good headphone as one expects from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Have these for about 2 years now and use them on a daily basis. Quality has gone a bit but for the money you pay its an great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for a low budget. Some noise cancelling for external sounds.
customer_reviews.author: dvdwylie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for money, offering a clear sound with good bass tones. These are a replacement for a an earlier model I lost and are even better. Delivered in the period specified.
customer_reviews.author: CJSH

customer_reviews.title: Well balanced sound
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased music clear and strong works a treat with my I pod shuffle and touch and for the price can not go wrong
customer_reviews.author: Podge

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my trip to Australia , always wanted good quality headphones and these are perfect
customer_reviews.author: iain dickson

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Really good pair of headphones. It was way better than I anticipated. Really comfortable and great quality sound
customer_reviews.author: AmberJ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, quality of build a bit questionable especially at the folding parts.
customer_reviews.author: Lefika

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: It's alright but the biggest downside is that it isn't comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Yun Zhu

customer_reviews.title: Bad sound quality
customer_reviews.text: It's not worth it for the price. Sound quality in middle high frequency is metalic and rough.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall very pleased for the price you won't get better
customer_reviews.author: T. Burrows

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product Good quality sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product Good quality sound, and built in mic idea for my purpose
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Mills

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, decent sound, single sided cable and a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Cross

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my daughter- she's impressed with the sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: light and compact with a big sound .....they don't disappoint
customer_reviews.author: gordon murray

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love the headphones. Can be very loud but no voice leaks, they also sound amazing. Just a coulpe of things to consider before buying: There is no volume buttons on the headphones Also there is no storage pouch with the headphones. If you can get over those facts then I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Medhat Shabana

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Loved the sound from these phones, this has revolutionised my listening. I'll never go back to ear buds again. listening to mostly rock and blues, it all sounds great and am hearing things I can't even pick up on good hifi speakers
customer_reviews.author: Sian F.

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable and stylish headphones I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable and stylish headphones I have ever owned. I could never fall asleep with previous headphones on, but these are cushioned so nicely! even underneath that thin head band so I can just drift off with ease. have no complaints with the sound quality either, and the folding is a nice feature. build quality seems really solid as well, and the cable is a nice length I think [perfect length for listing to your phone in pocket] I found headphone cables to be annoyingly long in the past, but bare that in mind if you want a long cable for x reason
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, not so comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: They sound great, however not so comfortable. Perhaps I have slightly bigger-than-average ears & head or simply the fact I wear glasses make them hurt my ears after around 45 minutes of constant use. Please note, that the actual ear pieces only slide up & down (not like most headphones where you can adjust the height of the overhead part) which is bit strange & I can bet it makes them slightly TIGHTER than my previous, similarly looking headphones. It's hard to judge really, but they might be OKAY for 90% of population nevertheless. For me, personally, I might need to replace these in near future - and check them in-store before buying.
customer_reviews.author: HappyAlbert

customer_reviews.title: My son recommended this product
customer_reviews.text: My son recommended this product, I use them to listen on my Roberts retro radio and on my Mac OS and i pad. I may not use the microphone facility but thought it handy to have for the future.
customer_reviews.author: IAIN L.

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. OK sound - lacks bass and a bit grainy. I did run them in for a few days continuously but no improvement. Returned to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. M.

customer_reviews.title: Great midrange headphones for those on a budget.
customer_reviews.text: Great mid range headphones for those on a budget. Only used once or twice so far but got it for long coach journeys. Sound quality is excellent for the price, great bass response and very little sound leakage so you can avoid getting on the nerves of other public transport users etc. The build qualifying great too, doesn't feel too flimsy. Recommended if you want decent headphones without the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound.
customer_reviews.text: As described, but I wish they came with 5 meter long Cables so I can walk around with them.
customer_reviews.author: Inquizator

customer_reviews.title: Good price and good product with nice design.
customer_reviews.text: Really nice headphones, I like the folding aspect and how slim & light they are. Good sound quailty with ok noise cancelling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound and very comfortable, plus the ear pieces fold up making them quite compact for storage. Certainly the right choice for me.
customer_reviews.author: Phill

customer_reviews.title: Left my ears dry
customer_reviews.text: Just not as pleasant as you would expect from sennheiser
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicely done Sennihiser
customer_reviews.text: They're good quality and build, much lighter than I thought intially from the picture, these also sit well over the ears. Nicely done Sennihiser thy. The item arrived on time and was fast.
customer_reviews.author: CiJereyBoy

customer_reviews.title: Sennheiser used to make good quality headphones at this price but now seem to ...
customer_reviews.text: Sennheiser used to make good quality headphones at this price but now seem to be focusing on the higher end of the market. The 2.20s are passable if you are static (ie sitting or commuting) but useless if you are on the move (running or walking) as the jack jumps out very easily. Sound quality is fine but nothing special. You will be able to fine a better equivalent for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: These headphones didn't last very long before the soft ear pad came off and can't repair them hence the one star
customer_reviews.author: Digi

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommended AYG
customer_reviews.text: I brought this Product and the AKG Y50. I highly recommended AYG Y50
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: easy and light to wear with good sound reproduction
customer_reviews.text: Superb headphones, easy and light to wear with good sound reproduction. My last pair of similar Sennheiser headphones lasted over 20 years before the padding disintergrated hoping these will last as long!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Moss

product_meta.title: Sennheiser HD 569 Around-Ear Closed Back Headphones - Black
product_meta.description:
Size Name:Around-Ear| Style Name:HD 569| Colour Name:BlackThe closed back HD 569 brings a flexible option to the Home entertainment space. It provides a rich and clear bass, adding further flexibility by making it possible to enjoy the full personal experience without disturbing others. With its full sized circumaural design, the HD 569 offers exceptional wearing comfort thanks to the large ear cups and soft replaceable ear pads.

BOX CONTAINS
HD 569 headset; Cable 1: 3m copper cable (OFC)/6.3mm straight plug: Cable 2: 1.2m single sided cable with integrated mic/3.5mm straight plug
feature_bullets: Padded headband and luxurious ear pads perfect for long listening sessions
1.2m detachable cable with 3.5mm Jack with in line microphone and remote for call & music control
Additional robust 3m detachable cable and 6.3mm jack
Black Color & Matte Finish.Sound pressure level (SPL)-118dB (1kHz/1Vrms)

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
